preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.system_role where name= 'Intake';

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.system_module where name= 'PatientDataOnResults';

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.system_role_module where system_role_id= '60';

changeSet.comment: Insert in clinlims new system role module

changeSet.author: CI OpenELIS developers group

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.system_module where name= 'MenuStatementConfig';

changeSet.comment: Insert in clinlims new role_module and module
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO clinlims.system_module(id, name, description, has_select_flag, has_add_flag, has_update_flag,has_delete_flag) VALUES (nextval('clinlims.system_module_seq'),'MenuStatementConfig','Admin=>MenuStatementConfig','Y','Y','Y','Y');
INSERT INTO clinlims.system_role_module(id, has_select, has_add, has_update, has_delete, system_role_id,system_module_id) VALUES (1056,'Y','Y','Y','Y',1,(select id from clinlims.system_module where name='MenuStatementConfig'));
